detail_desc: Metal jewellery set with two pairs of studs, two pairs of earrings and six rings.

Lightweight running gilet in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with thermal sections in woven fabric front and back, and reflective details. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams, a zipped phone pocket above the hem at the back, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with an ankle-height shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave made from a cotton blend with embroidery. Round neck with a drawstring, a V-shaped opening at the front and short raglan sleeves.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and raw-edge hem.

Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves and a drawstring at the hem of the top layer. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave in a straight cut with half-length sleeves that are open at the top with ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Sleeveless V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a frill around the armholes and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam with a tie belt under the bust.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Joggers in a soft cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring waist, patch front pockets, a fake fly, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with a drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and zipped leg pockets.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an unlined hood, button placket, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in denim with hard-worn details and small, decorative metal studs at the front. Zip fly and button and a raw, cut-off edge at the hem.
Water bottle in soft plastic with a print motif and sports cap.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs.
Trainers in cotton with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.
Shorts in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a glittery print. Zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fabric cap with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top, smocked bodice and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Joggers in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted vest tops in organic cotton jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Leggings in sturdy, stretch jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with belt loops and a chunky zip at one side. Extra-long legs with decorative and flatlock seams and a chunky zip at the front of the hems.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with flounces at the top that go over the shoulder straps and continue down the back. Inset panel at the waist.
Loose-fitting trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side and back pockets and straight legs with stripes down the sides and sewn-in creases.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Socks in airy jersey with decorative roses and elasticated tops.

Straight-cut blouse woven in an airy viscose and cotton blend with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, loose yoke at the shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Large, round earrings made of moving metal plates put together to form a disc. Diameter 6.5 cm.
Duffle coat in soft fleece with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Sleeveless dress with sequins, glittery threads and a frill trim at the top. Wide shoulder straps, a jersey top section and seam at the waist. Lined skirt with several layers of tulle.

Super push-up bras in organic cotton jersey with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Twill trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in woven fabric with one welt back pocket, a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in airy jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
Single-breasted jacket in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with notch lapels, a button at the front and patch front pockets. Partly lined.
Straight-cut lace dress with a V-neck front and back. Lined with a jersey underdress.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Ankle-length dress in crisp cotton poplin with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with pleats and wide, buttoned cuffs. Pleats to define the waist and add volume and a flared, voluminous skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jumper in a fluffy knit with a sheen. Elastication at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping imitation leather with a high waist, covered press-studs down the front and a wide, detachable tie belt. Lined in airy jersey.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Soft slippers in jersey with a motif on the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide trousers in sturdy cotton twill. High waist with wide belt loops, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the front. Low crotch, a zip fly, side pockets and patch back pockets with a button. Wide legs that taper slightly at the hems.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Knee socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a decorative satin bow at the top.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Two flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with rounded lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
